fields.description:
NPE in test200 of ITestS3ACommitterMRJob.

Cause is
* test dir setup and propagation calls Path.getRoot().toUri() which returns the /home dir
* somehow the locatedFileStatus of that path being 1 so a codepath in FileInputFormat NPEs.

Fix is in test code, though FileInputFormat has its NPE messages improved to help understand what is going wrong.
